title: LAAAG
body: Almost every game usually around the 13 minute mark my frame rate drops to around 10 or less for a few minutes and then comes back up to normal which is 90+.

replies.body: That's a really weird issue, and I'm wonder if there's some game file during that period that could be causing this, or some kind of pc stress impacting your frame rate.  First thing first, we'll want to rule out some possibilities.  This would be best done by going over each step in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide.  Go over that, test it in a custom, and let me know if it helps at all!
